StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdatePriorService]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonId int, @BeginDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @Separa.onCode varchar(4), @ReenlistmentCode varchar(2), @ServiceCharacter char(1), @RecordStatus varchar(10), @ServiceID int, @EndOfObligatedServiceDate date.me, @ComponentCode varchar(2) = NULL, @PMOSCode varchar(4) = NULL, @CurrentlyInReserves char(1) = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
SET @ComponentCode = COALESCE(@ComponentCode, (SELECT TOP 1 N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE FROM NWA N WHERE N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonId ORDER BY N.NWA_ID DESC), SPACE(0))
--- PRINT 'COMPONENT CODE = ' + @ComponentCode
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND COMPONENT_CODE = @ComponentCode AND END_DATE = @EndDate) BEGIN --- UPDATE PRIOR SERVICE UPDATE CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE SET BEGIN_DATE = @BeginDate, SEPARATION_CODE = @Separa.onCode, REENLISTMENT_CODE = @ReenlistmentCode, SERVICE_CHARACTER = @ServiceCharacter, VERIFICATION = @RecordStatus, PMOS_CODE = @PMOSCode, SERVICE_ID = @ServiceID, CURRENTLY_IN_RESERVES = @CurrentlyInReserves, END_OF_OBLIGATED_SERVICE_DATE = @EndOfObligatedServiceDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND COMPONENT_CODE = @ComponentCode AND END_DATE = @EndDate END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT PRIOR SERVICE INSERT CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, COMPONENT_CODE, SEPARATION_CODE, REENLISTMENT_CODE, SERVICE_CHARACTER, VERIFICATION, PMOS_CODE, SERVICE_ID, CURRENTLY_IN_RESERVES, END_OF_OBLIGATED_SERVICE_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@PersonID, @BeginDate, @EndDate, @ComponentCode, @Separa.onCode, @ReenlistmentCode, @ServiceCharacter, @RecordStatus, @PMOSCode, @ServiceID, @CurrentlyInReserves, @EndOfObligatedServiceDate, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
